title: How would I change my sound (whole computer, not just League) to Mono instead of Stereo?
body:
I broke my headset last night and so now I only have the left headphone. A lot of the music I listen to has bits where something plays in only the right headphone.

Example (0:27)
https://youtu.be/0ZXWSO_Y2C0?t=27s
